column4: Guys how the heck do i move a file from desktop to my /usr/lib. i have no permission to
what are you trying to accomplish?  and are you running 64bit OS?

ok - well i don't have the foggiest how to manually add libraries, maybe it's just a matter of copying them in there - but i'm not sure.  i don't really think it's the greatest ideal to try manually adding libraries actually... but you need to use sudo to copy anything into /usr.  best of luck.
is dolphin-emu a 32 or 64 bit application?  "file /usr/local/bin/dolphin-emu" if you aren't sure.
